name: Ahmed Chawki
description: '''Ahmed Chawki''' ({{langx|ar|أحمد شوقي}}; born 31 December 1982), known professionally by his [[stage name]] '''Chawki''', is a Moroccan singer, songwriter and producer. Chawki began his career in the early 2000s. He had a music band named La Paloma which mainly focused on Arabic and Moroccan music. On occasion of the [[2014 World Cup]], he was featured in a football-themed song "[[Magic in the Air (Magic System song)|Magic in the Air]]" by [[Magic System]], a hit in France and Belgium. He is currently signed to [[RedOne Records]], an international record label founded and owned by the producer.
